name: quickwikieditor
description: Edittool for Wikipedia authors. Simple and fast direct on-page editing of article text sniplets without using the Wikipedia editor.
author: Michael F. Sch√∂nitzer

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Key combination to start the editor. Valid modifiers: shift, alt, meta, control & accel. Restart (i. e. disable/enable tool) required.

preferences.name: linkhotkey
preferences.title: Link-Hotkey
preferences.description: Key combination to directly make the current selection a link. Restart (i. e. disable/enable tool) required.

preferences.name: summary
preferences.title: Edit summary
preferences.description: The edit summary shown in the article version history. Use value _AUTO_ for automatically generated summary

preferences.name: minor
preferences.title: Mark edits as minor
preferences.description: Should the edits be marked as minor edits?

preferences.name: viewcontextmenu
preferences.title: Add entry to context menu?
preferences.description: Add an entry in the context menu to start the editor. Restart (i. e. disable/enable tool) required.

preferences.name: viewicon
preferences.title: View Status-icon?
preferences.description: If checked, an icon in the add-on-bar will show the status and provides further tools. Restart (i. e. disable/enable tool) required.
